entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Cambridge Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:41 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 36 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 36 by morning. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:39 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 36. POP 30%
